name: pat that lad!
description:
my entry for the clicker game jam spring 2022!

disclaimer - unfortunately there's no way to save your progress yet!

this is as far as i managed to get during the jam's duration, but i'll definitely keep working on this project, so you can just see this as sort of a demo for the full game :D

for now, have fun patting an adorable lil raccooon uwu

also: i know it's not very well balanced yet, the glove's upgrades are too weak, no sound yet, and so on... like i said, please treat it like a demo ^^° didn't have any time for fine tuning
